itemDisplayName: JBoss EAP 7.2 on RHEL 8.0 on Azure (clustered, multi-VM)
description: This template allows you to create 2 RHEL 8.0 VMs running JBoss EAP 7.2 cluster and also deploy a web application called eap-session-replication, you can login into the admin console using the EAP username and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: This template deploys a EAP Session Replication web application on JBoss EAP 7.2 cluster running on 2 RHEL 8.0 VMs
